## TransferManager.(constructor)

Constructs a new \[\[TransferManager\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(fetchFunction?: typeof fetch, maxRetries?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fetchFunction | typeof fetch | The default fetch function to use. |
|  maxRetries | number | The maximum amount to try to re-fetch a resource. |
